speaker: Dark Mage
lines: You find the dark mage miles away from the academy
Seeing you approach, he quickly casts a spell and you are transported to his lair
The wizard is a tall, thin man with a long white beard and a pointy hat
He is sitting in a large chair made of stone
'Why have you come in search of me?' he asks you.

choices.text: You ask the dark mage to teach you his spells

give_item.name: Poison Plague
give_item.description: A spell infesting the target with a deadly plague

choices.text: You decide to fight the dark mage.
You decide to leave the dark mage's lair.
